item.title: Ubuntu upgrade 14.04 to 16.04 to 18.04
item.description: Berikut langkah yang dilakukan, tapi sebelumnya pastikan backup, backup dan backup sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get upgrade sudo do-release-upgrade -f DistUpgradeViewNonInteractive Referensi: https://www.google.com/search?q=ubuntu+upgrade+14.04+to+16.04 https://medium.com/@shathi.ece/upgrade-ubuntu-14-04-lts-to-ubuntu-16-04-lts-d0225503efb4
